Subscription.Description: Windows Code Integrity Checks (kernel-mode driver and user-mode protected media validation, invalid hashes).
Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <!-- Inspired by Microsoft Documentation and/or IADGOV --> <Query Id="0" Path="Microsoft-Windows-CodeIntegrity/Operational"> <!-- Windows Code Integrity Checks (Kernel-mode Driver and User-mode Protected Media Validation) --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-CodeIntegrity/Operational">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-CodeIntegrity'] and (Level=2 or Level=3) and (EventID=3001 or EventID=3002 or EventID=3003 or EventID=3004 or EventID=3010 or EventID=3023)]]</Select> </Query> <Query Id="1" Path="Security"> <!-- Windows Code Integrity Checks (Invalid hashes) --> <!-- Code integrity determined that a file does not meet the security requirements to load into a process. --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Security-Auditing'] and (Level=0 or Level=4) and (EventID=5038 or EventID=6281 or EventID=6410)]]</Select> </Query> </QueryList>
